name: The Space Brigade - Space Raiders
description:
While venturing into space with your crew, you enter a dangerous black hole where you have to SURVIVE, your big ship can't avoid the asteroids, so now it looks like a job for you captain.

Destroy 'em all, and also recover our supplies, avoid destroying them, also there's some laser guns we dropped.

System Requirements: Minimum:
  • OS: Minimum Windows XP SP3 Operating System. Supports Vista, 7 , 8 and Windows 10.
  • CPU: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher.
  • RAM: 256 MB RAM.
  • GPU/APU: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9.
  • Graphics Library:  Direct3D 9
Recommended:
  • OS:  Windows 10 20H2 64 bits.
  • CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7100U CPU @ 2.40GHz
  • RAM: 8 GB Dual Stick RAM.
  • GPU: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Graphics Library:  DirectX11

Legacy HTML5 version
